title.rendered: What is Google My Business and How Does It Help Small Businesses?

content.rendered:
There are currently over 400 million small businesses located across the globe. In fact, the accurate figure is expected to be much, much greater.

With so many local businesses struggling to engage their target audience, it’s impossible to ignore the thick layer of competition they’re engulfed in.

As a small business, you’re competing with thousands of local businesses in your industry.

Sure, you’ve launched a website. And great, your marketing team is putting out word on social media.

But that’s not enough.

As the competition thickens every day, you have to stand out to your local audience. Google My Business helps you do just that.

What is Google My Business? It’s a versatile tool that enables small businesses to engage and convert their local target audience.

Let’s say a web user looks up “the best pizza places near me.” If they’re located in Brooklyn, New York, the top-rated pizzerias in their surrounding area will show up.

If you run a pizza parlor in Brooklyn, you can leverage Google My Business to help your business show up among the first few search results.

The outcome? More clicks, leads, conversions, and sales.

It’s that simple and quick.

In this video, we break down the basics of Google My Business and walk you through its benefits for small businesses.

Get your business seen today. Call us at 855-444-4777 to speak with our Google My Business experts and start achieving local visibility.

Subscribe now: https://bit.ly/3kL0Ka4

Check out: https://www.searchberg.com/gmb-optimization/
